languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} leaps into the air and lands on the selected cell. Upon landing, they deal {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.
This leap can be made to any unoccupied cell within a 3-cell radius in the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The Bladedancer cannot jump to a cell that is inaccessible in combat.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each use requires a charge to be spent and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}short of breath{/g} on the Bladedancer until the start of their next turn.
The Bladedancer gains +1 charge of this ability each time they kill a target (excluding kills made with this ability).
! Can only be used with a sword equipped.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Танцор смерти{/g} совершает прыжок и приземляется на выбранную клетку, после чего наносит {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} всем противникам на соседних клетках.
Таким образом танцор смерти может прыгнуть на любую свободную клетку в радиусе 3 клеток в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Это движение не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Танцор смерти не может прыгнуть на недоступную ячейку.
Эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} можно использовать сколько угодно раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, но для каждого применения требуется потратить заряд. Также каждое применение накладывает на танцора смерти +1 уровень {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}усталости{/g} до начала его следующего хода.
Танцор смерти получает +1 заряд этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} за каждое убийство цели (за исключением убийств, совершенных этой способностью).
! Может использоваться только с мечом.

traits.locale_text:
Reaper jumps into the air and lands into a cell up to 3 cells away, dealing damage equal to {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} to all enemies adjacent to the target cell.
This movement does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}. This movement can be made to any reachable unoccupied cell on the battlefield, as long as it is within range and the Reaper has {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to that cell.
Reaper gains one use of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} once per every kill the Reaper makes (except the kills made by Death Waltz). This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used without charges, but it can be used multiple times per turn. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} leaps into the air and lands on the selected cell. Upon landing, they deal {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.
This leap can be made to any unoccupied cell within a 3-cell radius in the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The Bladedancer cannot jump to a cell that is inaccessible in combat.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each use requires a charge to be spent and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}short of breath{/g} on the Bladedancer until the start of their next turn.
The Bladedancer gains +1 charge of this ability each time they kill a target (excluding kills made with this ability).
! Can only be used with a sword equipped.

The Bladedancer leaps into the air and lands on a selected cell within a 3-cell radius. Upon landing, they deal {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} damage to all enemies adjacent to that cell. This leap can be made to any unoccupied and reachable for the Bladedancer cell within range in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per turn but each use requires a charge to be spent. The Bladedancer gains +1 charge of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} each time they kill a target (except kills made with Death From Above). This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword in hand.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} leaps into the air and lands on the selected cell. Upon landing, they deal {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.
This leap can be made to any unoccupied cell within a 3-cell radius in the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The Bladedancer cannot jump to a cell that is inaccessible in combat.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each use requires a charge to be spent and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}short of breath{/g} on the Bladedancer until the start of their next turn.
The Bladedancer gains +1 charge of this ability each time they kill a target (excluding kills made with this ability).
! Can only be used with a sword equipped.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} leaps into the air and lands on the selected cell. Upon landing, they deal {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.
This leap can be made to any unoccupied cell within a 3-cell radius in the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The Bladedancer cannot jump to a cell that is inaccessible in combat.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each use requires a charge to be spent and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}short of breath{/g} on the Bladedancer until the start of their next turn.
The Bladedancer gains +1 charge of this ability each time they kill a target (excluding kills made with this ability).
! Can only be used with a sword equipped.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} leaps into the air and lands on the selected cell. Upon landing, they deal {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies. This leap can be made to any unoccupied cell within a 3-cell radius in the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The Bladedancer cannot jump to a cell that is inaccessible in combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each use requires a charge to be spent. The Bladedancer gains +1 charge of this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} each time they kill a target (excluding kills made with Death From Above). This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword equipped.

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} da un salto y cae en la casilla seleccionada. Al caer, inflige {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a todos los enemigos adyacentes.
Este salto puede realizarse a cualquier casilla vacía en un radio de 3 casillas dentro de la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} del hoja danzante. Este movimiento no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. El hoja danzante no puede saltar a una casilla inaccesible en combate.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} puede usarse varias veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, pero cada uso consume una carga e inflige 1 acumulación de {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}Falta de aliento{/g} al hoja danzante hasta el principio de su siguiente turno.
El hoja danzante gana 1 carga de esta capacidad cada vez que mata a un enemigo (sin contar las muertes causadas por esta capacidad).
! Solo se puede usar con una espada equipada.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} leaps into the air and lands on the selected cell. Upon landing, they deal {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.
This leap can be made to any unoccupied cell within a 3-cell radius in the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The Bladedancer gains +1 charge of this ability each time they kill a target (excluding kills made with this ability).

traits.locale_text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} da un salto y cae en la casilla seleccionada. Al caer, inflige {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a todos los enemigos adyacentes.
Este salto puede realizarse a cualquier casilla vacía en un radio de 3 casillas dentro de la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} del hoja danzante. Este movimiento no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. El hoja danzante no puede saltar a una casilla inaccesible en combate.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} puede usarse varias veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, pero cada uso consume una carga e inflige 1 acumulación de {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}Falta de aliento{/g} al hoja danzante hasta el principio de su siguiente turno.
El hoja danzante gana 1 carga de esta capacidad cada vez que mata a un enemigo (sin contar las muertes causadas por esta capacidad).
! Solo se puede usar con una espada equipada.

El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} da un salto y cae en la casilla seleccionada. Al caer, inflige {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a todos los enemigos adyacentes. Este salto puede realizarse a cualquier casilla vacía en un radio de 3 casillas dentro de la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} del hoja danzante. Este movimiento no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. El hoja danzante no puede saltar a una casilla inaccesible en combate. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} puede usarse varias veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, pero cada una gasta una carga. El hoja danzante gana +1 carga de esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} cada vez que mata a un objetivo (sin contar las muertes que causa Muerte desde el cielo). Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} solo puede usarse con una espada equipada.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}は空中に飛び上がり、選択したセルに着地する。着地時、隣接するすべての敵に{uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
この跳躍は、ブレードダンサーの{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}内の半径3セル以内にある空いているセルに向かって行うことができる。この移動は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発させない。ブレードダンサーは、戦闘中にアクセスできないセルにはジャンプできない。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に複数回使用することができるが、使用するたびに必要なチャージが消費される。ブレードダンサーは次のターン開始まで持続する{g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}息切れ{/g}スタックを受ける。ブレードダンサーでターゲットを倒すたび、このアビリティのチャージを+1得る（このアビリティでのキルを除く）。剣装備時のみ使用できる。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} leaps into the air and lands on the selected cell. Upon landing, they deal {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.
This leap can be made to any unoccupied cell within a 3-cell radius in the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The Bladedancer cannot jump to a cell that is inaccessible in combat.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each use requires a charge to be spent and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}short of breath{/g} on the Bladedancer until the start of their next turn.
The Bladedancer gains +1 charge of this ability each time they kill a target (excluding kills made with this ability).
! Can only be used with a sword equipped.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}は空中に飛び上がり、選択したセルに着地する。着地時、隣接するすべての敵に{uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。 この跳躍は、ブレードダンサーの{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}内の半径3セル以内にある空いているセルに向かって行うことができる。この移動は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発させない。ブレードダンサーは、戦闘中にアクセスできないセルにはジャンプできない。 この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に複数回使用することができるが、使用するたびに必要なチャージが消費される。ブレードダンサーでターゲットを倒すたび、この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のチャージを+1得る（天からの死でのキルを除く）。この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は剣装備時のみ使用できる。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}跃至空中，随后降落在选定的格子上，对周围所有邻近敌人造成{uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
刀锋舞者可以跳跃到{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内3格内未被占据的格子处，此动作不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。不过，刀锋舞者无法跳到战斗中无法进入的格子。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}可以在每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内多次使用，但每次使用都会消耗1次使用次数，而且会对刀锋舞者施加1层{g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}气喘吁吁{/g}效果，持续至刀锋舞者下个回合开始。
每当刀锋舞者击杀目标时（不包括使用此能力击杀的目标），都会获得1次此能力的使用次数。
！只能在装备长剑的情况下使用。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} leaps into the air and lands on the selected cell. Upon landing, they deal {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.
This leap can be made to any unoccupied cell within a 3-cell radius in the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The Bladedancer gains +1 charge of this ability each time they kill a target (excluding kills made with this ability).
! Can only be used with a sword equipped.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}跃至空中，随后降落在选定的格子上，对周围所有邻近敌人造成{uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
刀锋舞者可以跳跃到{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内3格内未被占据的格子处，此动作不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。不过，刀锋舞者无法跳到战斗中无法进入的格子。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}可以在每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内多次使用，但每次使用都会消耗1次使用次数，而且会对刀锋舞者施加1层{g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}气喘吁吁{/g}效果，持续至刀锋舞者下个回合开始。
每当刀锋舞者击杀目标时（不包括使用此能力击杀的目标），都会获得1次此能力的使用次数。
！只能在装备长剑的情况下使用。

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} bondit vers une case sélectionnée. À l'atterrissage, il inflige {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} aux ennemis adjacents.
Ce bond peut être effectué vers n'importe quelle case inoccupée dans un rayon de 3 cases dans la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} du danselame. Ce déplacement ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Le danselame ne peut pas bondir vers une case inaccessible en combat.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, mais chaque utilisation consomme une charge et inflige au danselame +1 cumul d'{g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}Essoufflement{/g} jusqu'au début de son prochain tour.
Le danselame gagne +1 charge de cette capacité chaque fois qu'il tue une cible (hors victimes tuées par cette capacité).
! Ne peut être utilisé qu'avec une épée.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} leaps into the air and lands on the selected cell. Upon landing, they deal {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.
This leap can be made to any unoccupied cell within a 3-cell radius in the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The Bladedancer cannot jump to a cell that is inaccessible in combat.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each use requires a charge to be spent and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}short of breath{/g} on the Bladedancer until the start of their next turn.
The Bladedancer gains +1 charge of this ability each time they kill a target (excluding kills made with this ability).
! Can only be used with a sword equipped.

traits.locale_text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} bondit vers une case sélectionnée. À l'atterrissage, il inflige {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} aux ennemis adjacents.
Ce bond peut être effectué vers n'importe quelle case inoccupée dans un rayon de 3 cases dans la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} du danselame. Ce déplacement ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Le danselame ne peut pas bondir vers une case inaccessible en combat.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, mais chaque utilisation consomme une charge et inflige au danselame +1 cumul d'{g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}Essoufflement{/g} jusqu'au début de son prochain tour.
Le danselame gagne +1 charge de cette capacité chaque fois qu'il tue une cible (hors victimes tuées par cette capacité).
! Ne peut être utilisé qu'avec une épée.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} springt hoch und landet auf dem gewählten Feld. Bei der Landung fügt er allen Gegnern auf angrenzenden Feldern {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.
Dieser Sprung ist auf beliebige freie Felder in einem Radius von 3 Feldern um die {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} des Klingentänzers möglich. Diese Bewegung provoziert keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}. Der Klingentänzer kann nicht auf Felder springen, die im Kampf unerreichbar sind.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} mehrmals eingesetzt werden, aber jeder Einsatz verbraucht eine Ladung und belegt den Klingentänzer bis zum Beginn seines nächsten Zuges mit +1 Stapel {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}Kurzatmig{/g}.
Der Klingentänzer erhält +1 Ladung dieser Fähigkeit für jedes getötete Ziel (mit Ausnahme von Zielen, die mit dieser Fähigkeit getötet wurden).
! Kann nur mit ausgerüstetem Schwert eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} leaps into the air and lands on the selected cell. Upon landing, they deal {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.
This leap can be made to any unoccupied cell within a 3-cell radius in the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The Bladedancer cannot jump to a cell that is inaccessible in combat.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each use requires a charge to be spent and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}short of breath{/g} on the Bladedancer until the start of their next turn.
The Bladedancer gains +1 charge of this ability each time they kill a target (excluding kills made with this ability).
! Can only be used with a sword equipped.

traits.locale_text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} springt hoch und landet auf dem gewählten Feld. Bei der Landung fügt er allen Gegnern auf angrenzenden Feldern {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.
Dieser Sprung ist auf beliebige freie Felder in einem Radius von 3 Feldern um die {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} des Klingentänzers möglich. Diese Bewegung provoziert keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}. Der Klingentänzer kann nicht auf Felder springen, die im Kampf unerreichbar sind.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} mehrmals eingesetzt werden, aber jeder Einsatz verbraucht eine Ladung und belegt den Klingentänzer bis zum Beginn seines nächsten Zuges mit +1 Stapel {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}Kurzatmig{/g}.
Der Klingentänzer erhält +1 Ladung dieser Fähigkeit für jedes getötete Ziel (mit Ausnahme von Zielen, die mit dieser Fähigkeit getötet wurden).
! Kann nur mit ausgerüstetem Schwert eingesetzt werden.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Танцор смерти{/g} совершает прыжок и приземляется на выбранную клетку, после чего наносит {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} всем противникам на соседних клетках.
Таким образом танцор смерти может прыгнуть на любую свободную клетку в радиусе 3 клеток в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Это движение не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Танцор смерти не может прыгнуть на недоступную ячейку.
Эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} можно использовать сколько угодно раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, но для каждого применения требуется потратить заряд. Также каждое применение накладывает на танцора смерти +1 уровень {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}усталости{/g} до начала его следующего хода.
Танцор смерти получает +1 заряд этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} за каждое убийство цели (за исключением убийств, совершенных этой способностью).
! Может использоваться только с мечом.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Танцор смерти{/g} совершает прыжок и приземляется на выбранную клетку, после чего наносит {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} всем противникам на соседних клетках.
Таким образом танцор смерти может прыгнуть на любую свободную клетку в радиусе 3 клеток в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Это движение не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Танцор смерти не может прыгнуть на недоступную ячейку.
Эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} можно использовать сколько угодно раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, но для каждого применения требуется потратить заряд. Также каждое применение накладывает на танцора смерти +1 уровень {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}усталости{/g} до начала его следующего хода.
Танцор смерти получает +1 заряд этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} за каждое убийство цели (за исключением убийств, совершенных этой способностью).
! Может использоваться только с мечом.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, havaya sıçrar ve seçilen hücreye iniş yapar. İniş sırasında, bitişikte bulunan tüm düşmanlara {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
Bu sıçrama, Kılıç Dansçısı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} bulunan 3 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki boş herhangi bir hücreye yapılabilir. Bu hareket, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Kılıç Dansçısı, çatışmada erişilemez durumdaki bir hücreye sıçrayamaz.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} içinde birden çok kez kullanılabilir ancak her biri bir kullanım hakkı harcar ve Kılıç Dansçısı üzerinde +1 {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}nefes darlığı{/g} birikimi oluşturur. Bu etki, Kılıç Dansçısı'nın bir sonraki turunun başlangıcına dek sürer.
Kılıç Dansçısı, her hedef öldürdüğünde (bu kabiliyeti kullanarak öldürdükleri hariç) bu kabiliyetten +1 kullanım hakkı kazanır.
! Yalnızca kılıç kuşanmışken kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} leaps into the air and lands on the selected cell. Upon landing, they deal {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.
This leap can be made to any unoccupied cell within a 3-cell radius in the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The Bladedancer cannot jump to a cell that is inaccessible in combat.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each use requires a charge to be spent and inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}short of breath{/g} on the Bladedancer until the start of their next turn.
The Bladedancer gains +1 charge of this ability each time they kill a target (excluding kills made with this ability).
! Can only be used with a sword equipped.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, havaya sıçrar ve seçilen hücreye iniş yapar. İniş sırasında, bitişikte bulunan tüm düşmanlara {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Bu sıçrama, Kılıç Dansçısı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} bulunan 3 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki boş herhangi bir hücreye yapılabilir. Bu hareket, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Kılıç Dansçısı, çatışmada erişilemez durumdaki bir hücreye sıçrayamaz. Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} içinde birden çok kez kullanılabilir ancak her biri bir kullanım hakkı harcar. Kılıç Dansçısı, her hedef öldürüşünde bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetten{/g} +1 kullanım hakkı kazanır (Tepeden Yağan Ölüm ile yapılan öldürüşler hariç). Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} yalnızca kılıç kuşanılmışsa kullanılabilir.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, havaya sıçrar ve seçilen hücreye iniş yapar. İniş sırasında, bitişikte bulunan tüm düşmanlara {uip|DamageTick|6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
Bu sıçrama, Kılıç Dansçısı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} bulunan 3 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki boş herhangi bir hücreye yapılabilir. Bu hareket, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Kılıç Dansçısı, çatışmada erişilemez durumdaki bir hücreye sıçrayamaz.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} içinde birden çok kez kullanılabilir ancak her biri bir kullanım hakkı harcar ve Kılıç Dansçısı üzerinde +1 {g|f:542bb296d9c942a8a0fb5583290d3720}nefes darlığı{/g} birikimi oluşturur. Bu etki, Kılıç Dansçısı'nın bir sonraki turunun başlangıcına dek sürer.
Kılıç Dansçısı, her hedef öldürdüğünde (bu kabiliyeti kullanarak öldürdükleri hariç) bu kabiliyetten +1 kullanım hakkı kazanır.
! Yalnızca kılıç kuşanmışken kullanılabilir.
